io.odysz.semantic.tier.docs

Interface IFileDescriptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SyncDoc

    public interface IFileDescriptor
    Since jserv 1.4.11, a file is an object shared across nodes, so this interface is also used for synchronizing.
    Author:
    ody
